scenarios.name: Demo iPhone 14 - Moderate Congestion
scenarios.description: Typical office environment with channel congestion from multiple clients

primaryBottleneck.description: Channel is moderately busy with 12 active clients
primaryBottleneck.recommendation: Consider load balancing to another AP or enabling band steering to 5GHz

summary.tldr: This device is experiencing moderate Wi-Fi performance. The main issue is channel congestion with multiple active clients sharing airtime. Signal quality is good, and backhaul has capacity.

linkQuality.diagnosis: Signal strength is good (-65 dBm) with adequate SNR (28 dB). The device is consistently using MCS 6-8, which indicates a solid radio link. Not a bottleneck.

interference.diagnosis: Retry rate is acceptable at 8%. There are 6 neighbor APs detected but noise floor is low. Some contention but not severe.

backhaul.diagnosis: Backhaul has plenty of capacity. Peak usage is only 45% of available bandwidth. Not a bottleneck.

clientLimitations.diagnosis: Device supports Wi-Fi 5 with 2 spatial streams and 80 MHz channels. Modern enough for good performance. Not a limiting factor.
